MediaConfig.Name: Media Configuration (Images & Audio)
MediaConfig.Label: Configure Media Paths
MediaConfig.Hint: Click to customize all images and sound effects used by the module.

Settings.AudioWarning: Note: Audio paths below are only used if 'Sound Language' is set to 'Custom'.

SoundLanguage.Name: Sound Language
SoundLanguage.Hint: Select which audio folder to use. 'Custom' uses the file paths defined in the Media Configuration menu.

Duration.Name: Duration: Countdown
Duration.Hint: Time in seconds for the countdown (0-10). Set to 0 to disable.

BlazeMessage.Name: Text: Blaze of Glory
BlazeMessage.Hint: The message displayed in chat when Blaze of Glory is chosen.

RiskDoubleRoll.Name: Risk It All: Double Roll (Sequential)
RiskDoubleRoll.Hint: If enabled, Risk It All will roll the Fear die first, wait 5 seconds, and then roll the Hope die for dramatic effect.

ShowProbabilities.Name: Show Probabilities
ShowProbabilities.Hint: If checked, displays the percentage chance of outcomes below each death option.

Background.Name: Main Screen Background
Background.Hint: The background image displayed behind the three choices.

Blaze.Name: Blaze of Glory Result
Blaze.Hint: The image shown when a player selects 'Blaze of Glory'.

AvoidScar.Name: Avoid Death (Scar)
AvoidScar.Hint: The image shown when Avoid Death roll fails (Roll <= Level).

AvoidSafe.Name: Avoid Death (Safe)
AvoidSafe.Hint: The image shown when Avoid Death roll succeeds (Roll > Level).

Hope.Name: Risk it All (Hope)
Hope.Hint: The image displayed when the 'Risk it All' roll results in Hope.

Fear.Name: Risk it All (Fear)
Fear.Hint: The image displayed when the 'Risk it All' roll results in Fear.

Critical.Name: Risk it All (Critical)
Critical.Hint: The image displayed when the 'Risk it All' roll is a Critical Success.

SoundRollScreen.Name: Roll Screen Open
SoundRollScreen.Hint: Sound played when the main selection screen appears.

SoundSuspense.Name: Countdown Ticking
SoundSuspense.Hint: The ticking/suspense sound played during the countdown (plays every second).

SoundBlaze.Name: Blaze of Glory Event
SoundBlaze.Hint: The sound effect played when 'Blaze of Glory' is selected.

SoundAvoidSafe.Name: Avoid Death (Safe)
SoundAvoidSafe.Hint: Sound played when Avoid Death succeeds.

SoundAvoidScar.Name: Avoid Death (Scar)
SoundAvoidScar.Hint: Sound played when Avoid Death fails (Scar).

SoundHope.Name: Risk it All (Hope)
SoundHope.Hint: Sound played on a Hope result.

SoundFear.Name: Risk it All (Fear)
SoundFear.Hint: Sound played on a Fear result.

SoundCritical.Name: Risk it All (Critical)
SoundCritical.Hint: Sound played on a Critical result.

SoundChatAvoid.Name: Announcement (Avoid)
SoundChatAvoid.Hint: Sound played when the Avoid Death announcement banner appears.

SoundChatBlaze.Name: Announcement (Blaze)
SoundChatBlaze.Hint: Sound played when the Blaze of Glory announcement banner appears.

SoundChatRisk.Name: Announcement (Risk)
SoundChatRisk.Hint: Sound played when the Risk it All announcement banner appears.

Risk.Speaker: Risk It All
Risk.HopeDesc: You stand, clearing Hit Points and/or Stress equal to the Hope Die value.
Risk.CriticalDesc: You stand and clear all Hit Points and Stress.
